title: Plan Helicopter Flight for Crew Change
description: A logistics coordinator plans a helicopter flight to transport personnel to and from an offshore platform.

tasks.description: Generate the passenger manifest for the flight based on crew change schedules.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete list of passengers for the flight is created.

tasks.description: Calculate the total weight of passengers and cargo to ensure it is within the helicopter's operational limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: The weight and balance calculation is completed and confirmed to be safe.

tasks.description: Book the flight with the helicopter operator and send the final manifest and schedule to all parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: The flight is officially booked and confirmed.
